ranks.text: On 6/18 there will be an umissable event with Yusuke. Talk to him at the train station's underground passageway afterwards.Unlocks Novice Duplication, a skill that allows Yusuke to produce low-level skill cards for you. These can be used to teach your Persona moves.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Yusuke's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
choices: Choice 2: "I can't wait." +3 / "I hope you're right." +3

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Yusuke the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.Unlocks the Ueno Museum location.
choices: Choice 3: "This isn't like you." +3 / "You're really giving up?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Artist Talk ability, giving Yusuke the chance to step in on a failed demon negotiation.Unlocks the Inokashira Park location.
choices: Choice 1: "Why are we in a boat?" +2 / "I should bring a girl here." +2
Choice 2: "Love comes in all forms." +3 / "Maybe you should train more." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Adept Duplication skill, which allows Yusuke to create medium-level skill cards on your request.Unlocks the Kanda Church location.
choices: Choice 1: "Do you want me to strip?" +3 / "I dunno if I can do it..." +2
Choice 2: "I'm sure you will." +3 / "It doesn't look like it." +3 / "Do you want to give up?" +2

ranks.text: Requires rank 4 Proficiency.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Yusuke the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members when in the party.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Master Duplication ability, which allows Yusuke to create skill cards for high-end skills..
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Yusuke a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Yusuke the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
choices: Choice 1: "Her love for her son." +3 / "The pain of separation." +3

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Makoto's Persona to its final form.
